Name: Crunches
Details: Lie on your back, knees bent, and feet flat. Lift your shoulders off the ground and contract your abs.

Name: Leg Raises
Details: Lie flat and lift your legs until they form a 90-degree angle, then lower slowly.

Name: Plank
Details: Hold a straight body position with forearms and toes on the ground.

Name: Russian Twists (No Weight)
Details: Sit with knees bent, lean back slightly, and twist your torso side to side.

Name: Seated Knee Tucks
Details: Sit on a bench, support yourself with your hands, and bring your knees to your chest.

Name: Mountain Climbers
Details: In a plank position, alternate driving your knees toward your chest.

Name: Bicycle Crunches
Details: Alternate elbow-to-knee crunches in a cycling motion.

Name: Dead Bug
Details: Lie on your back with arms and legs extended. Lower opposite limbs while keeping your core tight.

Name: Ab Machine Crunches
Details: Use an ab crunch machine for guided resistance movements.

Name: Cable Crunches
Details: Kneel with a cable rope overhead and crunch downward.

Name: Sit-Ups
Details: Lie on your back, feet flat, and knees bent. Sit up fully, then return.

Name: Plank Shoulder Taps
Details: In a plank position, tap each shoulder alternately.

Name: Reverse Crunches
Details: Lie on your back and lift your hips as you bring your knees toward your chest.

Name: Side Plank
Details: Hold a straight side position on one forearm, switching sides after 30 seconds.

Name: Heel Touches
Details: Lie on your back, knees bent, and alternate reaching toward each heel.

Name: Flutter Kicks
Details: Lie flat and perform small, alternating leg lifts.

Name: Standing Side Crunches
Details: Stand straight and alternate crunching to each side.

Name: Bird Dog
Details: On all fours, extend opposite limbs while keeping your core engaged.

Name: Wall Plank
Details: Hold a plank position with your feet against the wall for stability.

Name: Standing Knee Raises
Details: Alternate lifting your knees toward your chest.

Name: Weighted Russian Twists
Details: Perform Russian twists holding a weight or medicine ball.

Name: Hanging Leg Raises
Details: Hang from a bar and lift your legs to 90 degrees.

Name: Incline Sit-Ups
Details: Use an incline bench to perform sit-ups with greater range.

Name: Stability Ball Crunches
Details: Perform crunches on a stability ball for added core activation.

Name: Ab Wheel Rollouts
Details: Roll out on an ab wheel, keeping your core tight.

Name: Side Plank with Leg Lift
Details: Perform a side plank and lift the top leg.

Name: Weighted Sit-Ups
Details: Perform sit-ups while holding a weight plate.

Name: Cable Woodchoppers
Details: Pull a cable diagonally downward, engaging your obliques.

Name: Mountain Climbers with Sliders
Details: Use sliders under your feet for mountain climbers.

Name: Reverse Plank
Details: Hold a plank position facing upward, supporting yourself on your hands and heels.

Name: V-Ups
Details: Simultaneously lift your legs and torso to form a V shape.

Name: Plank to Elbow Touch
Details: Alternate touching your elbows while maintaining a plank.

Name: Side V-Ups
Details: Lie on your side and lift your legs and torso together.

Name: Tuck Plank
Details: Alternate pulling knees toward your chest in a plank position.

Name: Superman Plank
Details: Extend one arm and the opposite leg while holding a plank.

Name: Standing Oblique Crunches
Details: Stand upright and alternate side crunches.

Name: Hollow Body Hold
Details: Lie flat, lift your shoulders and legs slightly, and hold.

Name: Bicycle Twists with Resistance Band
Details: Use a resistance band to add difficulty to bicycle crunches.

Name: Dynamic Side Plank
Details: Move your hips up and down while holding a side plank.

Name: Marching Bridge
Details: Lie on your back and alternate lifting each knee in a glute bridge position.

Name: Dragon Flags
Details: Lie on a bench, hold the edge, and lift your body straight like a flag.

Name: Toes-to-Bar
Details: Hang from a pull-up bar and bring your toes to touch the bar.

Name: Barbell Rollouts
Details: Use a loaded barbell to perform rollouts.

Name: Windshield Wipers

Details: Hold a weight plate while maintaining a side plank.

Details: Perform twists on a decline bench with a weight.
